artifacts.summary: Phases 2-4: Added saturation infrastructure, fixed-point construction, and modal saturation definitions (~310 lines)
Implementation summary documenting Phases 1-4 progress, proven theorems, and remaining sorries

partial_progress.details: Phase 2 (saturation infrastructure), Phase 3 (fixed-point construction), and Phase 4 (modal saturation definition) completed. 7 key theorems proven. 5 sorries remain in ModalSaturation.lean. Phases 5-7 remain: complete modal_backward_from_saturation, update Completeness.lean, verification.

completion_data.completion_summary: Implemented Phases 2-4 of FDSM multi-history modal saturation. Added buildWitnessHistory (using Lindenbaum MCS), saturation_step, saturate_with_fuel, is_modally_saturated. Proved 7 key theorems including buildWitnessHistory_models_psi, saturation_step_card_increase, and fixed_point_stable. 5 sorries remain for classical arguments and truth lemma integration. Phases 5-7 (modal_backward, Completeness.lean update, verification) remain.
